briefTitle: Safety and Immunogenicity of V114 in Healthy Infants in South Korea (V114-036)
officialTitle: A Phase 3, Single-Arm, Open-label Clinical Study to Evaluate the Safety and Immunogenicity of 4 Doses of V114 Administered to Healthy Infants in South Korea.
summary: The primary purpose of this phase 3, single-arm, open-label study is to evaluate the safety and immunogenicity of a 4-dose regimen of V114 administered to healthy infants in South Korea.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With ≥1 Solicited Injection-site Adverse Events
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Up to 7 days after any vaccination, up to a total of ~ 13 months
